xml.summary: no redirection to the CoffeeBerry Facebook account via tapping on the icon Facebook
xml.description: redirecting to the CoffeeBerry VK account instead of Facebook by clicking on the Facebook icon
xml.steps: open Coffee Minsk app, find CoffeeBerry coffee shops in the catalog, open CoffeeBerry coffee shop's info page, tap on Facebook icon
xml.actual: user is redirected to the VK profile of coffee shop
xml.expected: user is redirected to the Facebook profile of coffee shop
